Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track level at Roosevelt. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track level at Roosevelt.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47th/Red Line
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, St.Lawrence, 47th, and Cottage Grove due to, police activity near 47th/Red Line.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 51st, St.Lawrence, 47th, and Cottage Grove due to, police activity near 47th/Red Line.

Allow extra travel time.
